channel.title: centos on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in centos on Vegetable Programing

item.title: 0.12系のtd-agentをインストールしたい
item.description: sudo sh <<SCRIPT # add GPG key rpm --import https://packages.treasuredata.com/GPG-KEY-td-agent # add treasure data repository to yum cat >/etc/yum.repos.d/td.repo <<'EOF'; [treasuredata] name=TreasureData baseurl=http://packages.treasuredata.com/2.5/redhat/\$releasever/\$basearch gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://packages.treasuredata.com/GPG-KEY-td-agent EOF # update your sources yum check-update # install the toolbelt yes | yum install -y td-agent SCRIPT install-redhat-td-agent2.5.sh Download | Fluentd
